name: Slime Slayer (itch) (SKNGWiGK)
description:
The knight Sir Roland decided to kill all slimes in slime's realm. You are the chosenone slime who must stop him. You can absorb other slimes, upgrade your stats, explore the realm, find the artifacts and fight!

Authors:

  • Łukasz Kubicki - Programmer
  • Michał Milka - 3D Graphics/Design
  • Paweł Lutostański - Programmer
  • Michał Pokrzywa - Design
  • Żaklina Osmenda - 3D Graphics/Programmer
  • Wiktoria Gajek - UX Design/2D Graphics
  • Paulina Hałatek - Programmer
  • Dawid "Streyter" - Design

We plan to continue the project, so stay tuned.
